summary: Elyse, a rich heiress, meets Rob, a bullied lawyer, and the two fall in love during a costume ball.
cast: Autumn Reeser|Christopher Russell|Richard Burgi|Helen Colliander|Damon Runyan|Chris Gillett|Neil Crone|Danny Smith|Kim Roberts|Shauna MacDonald|Patrice Goodman|Anand Rajaram|Lisa Boivin|Deven Stillar|Kelsey Ruhl|Claire Calarco|Kelly Martin|Michael Cleland|Douglas E. Davidson|Yvonne E. Davidson|Evie Moores|Rodney JR Wilcox|Catherine-rain Wilcox|Tammy-lynn Wilcox
title: Midnight Masquerade
